channel.title: Open Source on Lift Deleted Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Lift Deleted Guide

item.title: Weekly Open Source — Hydra (OAuth2/OpenID Connect Server)
item.description: Hydra is an OpenID Connect certified OAuth2 server. The post walks through running it with Docker and Postgres/MySQL.

item.title: Weekly Open Source — Apache SkyWalking
item.description: APM and distributed tracing with SkyWalking; installation links and quick tips.

item.title: Weekly Open Source — Timed Jobs in .NET Core
item.description: Featuring a timed job library for .NET Core and examples of scheduled tasks.

item.title: A Pragmatic Guide to Proxy IPs for Crawlers
item.description: Summary of proxyipcenter (by @virjar): a server that scrapes, de‑dupes, enriches, validates, and scores proxies; and a client that manages a per‑target pool for crawlers. See Chinese post for full details and JSON examples.
